snippet.title: Ancestory Closed Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
COMING TO STEAM FALL 2015!

Summon souls of tribesmen and cast devastating spells to vanquish your foes in a mix of turn-based strategy and card game.

Key Features:
  Online Multiplayer - Challenge your friend!
  Singleplayer - Practice against an AI!
  Deckbuilding - Collect new cards and skills!
  Multiple levels - Form new strategies for all of them!

Follow us at:
http://ancestorygame.com
http://twitter.com/ancestorygame
http://facebook.com/ancestorygame
http://www.indiedb.com/games/ancestory
